long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Due to the fact that elevcentralen is only made to be used with a mouse, this addons adds some hotkeys.

Answer quizzes with the keys "1-9". Go to next and previous question with the arrow keys. Open the overview with "O" and expand the images to fullscreen with "I".
